description:
Streamline your systems management

Scan, collect, and organize your on-prem Windows machines so deployments go exactly where you need them to with PDQ Inventory.
Security Enhancements
- Added a best security practices alert notification system
- Checks and secures database in product to remove NT AUTHORITY\INTERACTIVE permission or notifies using alert system if fails
- Deploy: Secures repo on fresh install to remove NT AUTHORITY\INTERACTIVE permission
- Deploy: Checks for NT AUTHORITY\INTERACTIVE permission on repo folder and notifies using alert system if found (does not auto-fix)

Improvements
- Inventory: Added security notice to Network Discovery window informing users about credential exposure risks when scanning untrusted networks

Bug Fixes
- Inventory: Added new scan datapoint to reflect PDQ Connect Agent install status and version.
- Deploy: Re-add proxy config to Package Downloads
- Deploy: Fixed blank message body when sending Deployment Notifications using Microsoft Graph API.
- Deploy: Fix issue that interfered with Deployment notifications
- Deploy: Prevent Event Log error when there is a change to the list of computers in the deployment history of a Schedule
